page.title: 10HOUSING
page.content: Lots of the buildings in this area are old. They are detached houses, cottages and farms. They are built of stone with slate roofs. Many of them have been renovated. They have been made longer and some have had extensions built on to them. There are two housing estates and the houses in them are terraced. The majority of the old houses face South and East. This is because they have been built with their backs to the West from where most of our bad weather comes. There are modern built houses made of bricks with a tile roof. There are detached buildings but some in Rhydymwyn form a small housing estate.
